definition: the quality of being solid and reliable financially or factually or morally
details:
noun
- the quality of being solid and reliable financially or factually or morally
= synonyms: solidity
- the quality of being substantial or having substance
= synonyms: substantiality, substantialness
- the consistency of a solid
= synonyms: solidity
- the state in which a substance has no tendency to flow under moderate stress
= synonyms: solid
